Title: It's Different for Girls
Plot: The cheerleaders prepare for Championship Classic. Lyla is picked on when people find out about her and Riggins. Coach Taylor tries to keep Matt and Julie apart. Jason goes home after being released from rehab.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Ladd Lebus, Stacey Schwartz, Ra'Nel Kendrick, Derek Phillips, James Powers, Ra'Shel Kendrick, Pastor Sid Johnson, Rebecca McFarland, John Newton, David Baugh, Whitney McCauley, Edward Herndon, Timothy F. Crowley
